task_description:
# Quick Capture Widgets

Create iOS and Android home screen widgets that allow instant note capture without opening the app. Support different widget sizes and show pinned notes or recent notes.

## Rationale
Addresses the core user goal of 'capture ideas quickly with minimal friction'. Widgets provide the fastest possible capture - no app launch required. This is a quality-of-life feature that delights users and differentiates from competitors that lack good widgets.

## User Stories
- As a user, I want to capture a note from my home screen without opening the app, so that I can instantly record thoughts
- As a user, I want to see my pinned notes on my home screen, so that I can quickly reference important information
- As a user, I want the widget to work offline, so that I can capture notes anywhere

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Small widget (2x2) for instant note capture with single tap
- [ ] Medium widget (4x2) showing last 3 notes + capture button
- [ ] Large widget (4x4) showing pinned notes + capture button
- [ ] Widget works offline and saves immediately
- [ ] Widget styling matches app theme (light/dark)
- [ ] Widgets update to show recent changes to pinned/recent notes
- [ ] Deep link from widget opens note in full app for editing
